name: All Star Twerkers: Worldwide
description:
Welcome To All Star Twerkers: Worldwide!

What's new:
All Star Twerkers: Worldwide steps into the real world with a whole host of real models from all your favorite social media platforms. Who you may ask? It's a surprise that'll make your jaw drop!
Stages! We have all new animated stages from around the world. Twerk in the rain, twerk for America! Bored with earth? Twerk on the moon and watch comets fly by!
Spectators! These crazy characters who will try to trip you up! Throw a brick in their face and show them who's boss!
Loads of new ways to MAKE IT RAIN! This time it's all about that "Clout" baby! Children throw bills, legends get that money gun and spray!
Will you be the big boss who has the most clout?

All Star Twerkers: Worldwide will have you dancing, dabbing, and dropping down low! With new content to come!It's bigger, it's better, it's back! The dancing game of the century bounces on to the scene ready to take on the world (and space)! Your favorite dancers return! Spicy Nae Nae, smooth Eduardo, and lovable Dixie along with all new characters from around the world!
